backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, video ideas, hashtags, publication state management, and staff analytics with authorization controls using MixinAuthorization and AccessControl.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining OldActor and NewActor types with a run function that currently performs no transformation (identity migration).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the StaffAnalyticsPanel component expansion to display metrics including total hashtags, average videos per user, top 5 hashtags, and recent user activity.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for UI elements, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the TikTok Companion application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, dashboard, calendar, hashtags, and settings pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Authentication guard component that redirects unauthenticated users, shows ProfileSetup for new users, and displays loading states during initialization and profile fetching.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Calendar grid component rendering a monthly view with navigation controls, displaying scheduled videos on their respective dates with click handlers for date selection.
frontend/src/components/HashtagCard.tsx: Card component displaying hashtag details with name, usage count, creation date, and a copy-to-clipboard button that appears on hover with success feedback.
frontend/src/components/HashtagForm.tsx: Form component for adding new hashtags with validation, auto-formatting (adds # prefix if missing), and toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with sticky header, navigation menu (Ideas, Calendar, Hashtags), mobile responsive menu, settings dropdown, and login button integration.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Onboarding card component for new users to create their profile by entering their name with a welcoming UI featuring gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleDialog.t: Dialog form for scheduling draft video ideas to specific dates using a calendar picker and dropdown selector for unscheduled videos.
frontend/src/components/StaffAnalyticsPa: Staff-only analytics dashboard displaying platform metrics including total users, videos, hashtags, active users, and top user activity with formatted statistics cards.
Password-protected dialog for staff access verification using a hardcoded staff code (2807) to unlock moderation controls.
frontend/src/components/UnpublishedOverl: Full-screen overlay component that blocks app access during maintenance, displaying a warning message about temporary unavailability.
frontend/src/components/VideoIdeaCard.ts: Displays a video idea as a card with title, description, hashtags, status badge, and date, featuring hover effects, edit button, and delete confirmation dialog for drafts.
frontend/src/components/VideoIdeaForm.ts: Form component for creating or editing video ideas with fields for title, description, and hashtags, using React Hook Form and toast notifications for feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient with configurable options and delegation identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized collection of React Query hooks for all backend operations including video ideas, hashtags, user profiles, statistics, and activities with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette using OKLCH color space, defining light and dark theme variables with energetic coral/orange/teal accent colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Calendar.tsx: Calendar page component that displays a monthly calendar view of scheduled TikTok videos with date range filtering, allows scheduling new videos via dialog, and shows unpublished overlay when app is unpublished.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page component that displays video ideas organized by status tabs (all/draft/scheduled/published), provides create/edit/delete functionality via dialogs, and shows unpublished overlay when app is unpublished.
frontend/src/pages/Hashtags.tsx: Hashtags page component that displays a searchable grid of hashtags, provides add hashtag functionality via dialog, and shows unpublished overlay when app is unpublished.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page component with hero section and features overview, includes call-to-action buttons to dashboard and calendar, and shows unpublished overlay when app is unpublished.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page component with staff-gated moderation controls for publishing/unpublishing the app, includes staff code verification dialog and analytics panel for verified staff users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup functions for sensitive parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including color schemes using OKLCH color space, font families (Inter, Poppins), custom shadows, animations, and container settings for a modern UI design system.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for a TikTok content management app, documenting 11 implemented features including video idea management, Internet Identity authentication, content calendar, hashtag tracking, and UI customizations like hamburger menu and settings page.
